title: Verify Target Discounted and Undiscounted Fee Hedrick Upsell flow
custom_preconds:
1. Follow steps from [C108998] for basic setup
2. Note the delivery methods,payment methods and service charges for Hatfield & McCoy, Comedy Barn, Opry and Magic Beyond Belief events

Service Charges:

1. Per-ticket service charge common to all events: Convenience Fee: $1.25/seat - CONVENIENC
2. Transaction service charge common to all events: Order Processing Fee: $2.20/transaction - ORDERPROCE
3. Per Ticket service charge common to all events: Per Ticket: $1.75/seat - 18PERTICKT
4. Tax:
Comedy Barn Event
----------------------
CBAMUSTAX1: 2.5% Round Half Up: $0.01
CBSALESTA1: 9.75%  Round Half Up: $0.01

Opry Event:
-------------
MMAMUSTX: 2.5% Round Half Up: $0.01
MMSALESTX: 9.75%  Round Half Up: $0.01

Magic Event:
--------------
MBBAMUSTX: 2.5% Round Half Up: $0.01
MBBSALESTX: 9.75%  Round Half Up: $0.01

Hatfield Event:
----------------
HMAMSPRTX: 1.375% Round Half Up: $0.01
HMSALESTX: 9.75%  Round Half Up: $0.01

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch MPV schedule link
2. Select an event from Event Run: 2018HM (Hatfield & McCoy)
3. Select few seats and click on add to cart
4. Login with valid credentials
5. Verify the PVODC lock request and response and note the source offer ID
6. Verify the delivery methods and payment methods listed
7. Verify the service charge calculation
8. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed
9. Select Combo special upsell opputunity
10. Select Comedy Barn Sales Group Item
11. Verify target event date filter
12. Select a date from the calendar view
13. Select a time slot
14. Verify the buyer type and quantity displayed
15. Verify the PVO2 Availability Call
16. NavMap Availability cache in Main.Site 
17. Verify Semaphore in PVODB:
Example: select *from pvo.semaphore_lock where semaphore like '%145606131%';
18. Click on add to cart
19. Verify PVO2 LockSeats request(in browser)
20. Verify V2 LockSeats request in splunk
21. Verify Cache and Semaphore in Main.Site and PVODB
22. Verify the original price and discounted price
23. Verify the savings text is displayed in the cart in green colorâ€“ defaults to â€˜Your savingsâ€™
24. Verify the delivery methods and payment methods listed
25. Verify the service charge calculation
26. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed
27. Select Combo special upsell opputunity
28. Repeat steps 10 to 25 adding events from Opry and Magic Beyond Belief
29. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed
30. Click Continue shopping
31. Select a Comedy Barn Event and add to cart
32. Verify that Total savings remain unchanged
33. Verify the delivery methods and payment methods listed 
34. Verify the service charge calculation
35. Expand Ma's Soup upsell strip
36. Select a different quantity
37. Select a different price scale
38. Change quantity
39. Click ADD TO CART
40. Verify PVO2 LockSeats request(in browser)
41. Verify V2 LockSeats request in splunk
42. Verify Cache and Semaphore in Main.Site and PVODB
43. Verify Total Savings
44. Verify the delivery methods and payment methods listed
45. Verify the service charge calculation
46. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed
47. Select delivery method and payment method and Place Order
48. Verify disc_by_upsell_sales_group_id and trig_by_upsell_sales_group_id in PVDB-Ticket table
49. Verify order details in PV - search with transaction id noted from confirmation page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV should be launched
2. Availability page willl be displayed
3. Forced login page will be displayed
4. Shopping cart page will be displayed
5. Login should be successful
6. The delivery methods  and payment methods available for the event selected should be listed
7. Service charges should be calculated correctly
8. The following upsell opportunity strip will be displayed in below order after offer details
1. Combo Special will displayed in full image template tile 
2. Ma's Soup will be displayed in Dynamic tile template with a Thumbnail Image
9. Following Sales group items should be displayed as full image and should be sorted in below order with tile header(Combo Special) and instruction(Select a show then select date, time, seating and number of tickets.):
1. Event Run: 2018CB (Comedy Barn)
2. Event run: 2018MM (Opry)
3. Event Run: 2018MG (Magic Beyond Belief)
10. Selecting the tile shall cause the application shall navigate directly to a calendar page for this item. There will not be an event list offered for target events in this phase, regardless of the default control center setting for calendar/event list.
11. Target events within following date range should only be displayed:  From 7 calendar days to 3 hours before the trigger event, and from 3 hours until 7 calendar days after the trigger event. 
12. When the desired date is displayed, an accordion is opened which provides additional details about the show(s) on that date. The user may select the button for the desired event time.
13. When the user selects a specific show, the application shall navigate to the availability page
14. Discounted Target buyer type mapped to the source buyer types locked for source event should be displayed with same quantity defaulted and user should not be able to select a different quantity
15. Upsell sales group id: 1001 should be passed in logs
16. NavMap Availability should be cached for sales group id: 1001
17. Values are updated correctly for upsell sales group id: 1001
18. Shopping cart page will be displayed with the added upsell offer and the source event offers
19. Upsell sales group id: 1001 and source offer id noted in step 5 should be passed in logs
20. Upsell sales group id: 1001 and source offer id noted in step 5 should be passed in logs
21. Values should be updated correctly for upsell sales group id: 1001
22. Dicounted price will be displayed in bold and the original undiscounted price will be displayed grayed out pre-fixed with the text "was"
23. Total savings amount should be displayed on Total amount due panel
24. Cross section of delivery methods and payment methods available for the events in the cart should be listed
25. Service charges should be calculated correctly
26. The following upsell opportunity strip will be displayed in below order below offer details
1. Combo Special will displayed in full image template tile 
2. Ma's Soup will be displayed in Dynamic tile template with a Thumbnail Image
27. Following Sales group items should be displayed as full image and should be sorted in below order:
1. Event run: 2018MM (Opry)
2. Event Run: 2018MG (Magic Beyond Belief)
28. 
29. Only Ma's Soup will be displayed in Dynamic tile template with a Thumbnail Image
30. User should be navigated to schedule list page
31. Comedy Barn event should be added to cart and Price should not be discounted for this event
32. Total savings should not be changed
33. Cross section of delivery methods  and payment methods available for the events in the cart should be listed
34. Service charges should be calculated correctly
35. Quantity and price scale drop downs will be displayed with default values
36. Price scale should not be changed and Total Price should be updated correctly for the Ma's Soup event
37. Quantity should not be changed and Total Price should be updated correctly for the Ma's Soup event
38. Price scale should not be changed and Total Price should be updated correctly for the Ma's Soup event
39. Offer should be added to cart and price should not be discounted
40. Upsell sales group id: 1003 and source offer id noted in step 5 should be passed in logs
41. Upsell sales group id: 1003 and source offer id noted in step 5 should be passed in logs
42. Values should be updated correctly for upsell sales group id: 1003
43. Total savings should not be changed
44. Cross section of delivery methods and payment methods available for the events in the cart should be listed
45. Service charges should be calculated correctly
46. No upsell opportunities should be displayed
47. Transaction should be completed successfully and note the transaction id
48. Source event ticket : Triggered by upsell sales group id=null, Discounted by upsell sales group id=null
Target event ticket : Triggered by upsell sales group id=<tid>, Discounted by upsell sales group id=<did>
additional event ticket: Triggered by upsell sales group id=null, Discounted by upsell sales group id=null
49. Order details should be displayed correctly in PV

title: Verify All Source Discounted  Fee Hedrick Upsell flow
custom_preconds:
Follow steps from C108998 for basic setup
Note the delivery methods,payment methods and service charges for Hatfield & McCoy, Comedy Barn, Opry and Magic Beyond Belief events
Service Charges:

Per-ticket service charge common to all events: Convenience Fee: $1.25/seat - CONVENIENC
Transaction service charge common to all events: Order Processing Fee: $2.20/transaction - ORDERPROCE
Per Ticket service charge common to all events: Per Ticket: $1.75/seat - 18PERTICKT
Tax:
Comedy Barn Event:
----------------------
CBAMUSTAX1: 2.5% Round Half Up: $0.01
CBSALESTA1: 9.75% Round Half Up: $0.01

Opry Event:
-------------
MMAMUSTX: 2.5% Round Half Up: $0.01
MMSALESTX: 9.75% Round Half Up: $0.01

Magic Event:
-------------
MBBAMUSTX: 2.5% Round Half Up: $0.01
MBBSALESTX: 9.75% Round Half Up: $0.01

Hatfield Event:
---
HMAMSPRTX: 1.375% Round Half Up: $0.01
HMSALESTX: 9.75% Round Half Up: $0.01

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch MPV Schedule link
2. Select an event from Event Run: Event Run: 2018CB (Comedy Barn)
3. Select few seats and click on add to cart
4. Login with valid credentials
5. Verify the PVODC lock request and response and note the source offer ID
6. Verify the delivery methods and payment methods listed
7. Verify the service charge calculation
8. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed
9. Repeat steps 2 to 8 adding events from Event Runs: 2018MM (Opry) and 2018MG (Magic Beyond Belief)
10. Repeat steps 2 to 8 adding events from Event Runs: 2018CB (Comedy Barn), 2018MM (Opry) and 2018MG (Magic Beyond Belief)
11. Select Hatfield & McCoy Combo Special upsell opputunity
12. Select the Sales Group Item
13. Verify target event date filter
14. Select a date from the calendar view
15. Select a time slot
16. Verify the buyer type and quantity displayed
17. Verify the PVO2 Availability Call
18. NavMap Availability cache in Main.Site 
19. Verify Semaphore in PVODB:
Example: select *from pvo.semaphore_lock where semaphore like '%145606131%';
20. Select same quantity for 1 buyer type and more qunatity for other buyer types and Click on add to cart
21. Verify PVO2 LockSeats request(in browser)
22. Verify V2 LockSeats request in splunk
23. Verify Cache and Semaphore in Main.Site and PVODB
24. Verify the original price and discounted price
25. Verify the savings text is displayed in the cart in green colorâ€“ defaults to â€˜Your savingsâ€™
26. Verify the delivery methods and payment methods listed
27. Verify the service charge calculation
28. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed
29. Click Continue shopping
30. Select a Hatfield & McCoy Event and add to cart
31. Verify that Total savings remain unchanged
32. Verify the delivery methods and payment methods listed and select a delivery method and payment method
33. Verify the service charge calculation
34. Place Order
35. Verify disc_by_upsell_sales_group_id and trig_by_upsell_sales_group_id in PVDB-Ticket table
36. Verify order details in PV - seach with transaction id noted from confirmation page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. MPV should be launched
2. Availability page will be displayed
3. Forced login page will be displayed
4. Shopping cart page will be displayed
5. 
6. The delivery methods  and payment methods available for the event selected should be listed
7. Service charges should be calculated correctly
8. The following upsell opportunity strip will be displayed in below order after offer details
1. Hatfield & McCoy Combo Special will displayed in full image template tile 
9. Events should be added to cart successfully
10. Events should be added to cart successfully
11. Following Sales group items should be displayed as full image and should be sorted in below order with tile header(Combo Special) and instruction(Select a show then select date, time, seating and number of tickets.):
1. Event Run: 2018HM (Hatfield & McCoy)
12. Selecting the tile shall cause the application shall navigate directly to a calendar page for this item. There will not be an event list offered for target events in this phase, regardless of the default control center setting for calendar/event list.
13. target events within following date range should only be displayed:  From 7 calendar days to 3 hours before the trigger event, and from 3 hours until 7 calendar days after the trigger event. 
14. When the desired date is displayed, an accordion is opened which provides additional details about the show(s) on that date. The user may select the button for the desired event time.
15. When the user selects a specific show, the application shall navigate to the availability page
16. Discounted Target buyer type mapped to the source buyer types locked for source event should be displayed with same quantity defaulted and user should be able to select a same or more quantity
17. Upsell sales group id: 1002 should be passed in logs
18. NavMap Availability should be cached for sales group id: 1002
19. Values are updated correctly for upsell sales group id: 1002
20. Shopping cart page will be displayed with the added upsell offer and the source event offers
21. Upsell sales group id: 1001 and source offer id noted in step 5 should be passed in logs
22. Upsell sales group id: 1001 and source offer id noted in step 5 should be passed in logs
23. Values should be updated correctly for upsell sales group id: 1002
24. Only the first source offer added from each asles group item will be discounted(repriced) and the discounted price will be displayed in bold and the original undiscounted price will be displayed grayed out pre-fixed with the text "was"
25. Total savings amount should be displayed on Total amount due panel
26. The delivery methods  and payment methods available for the event selected should be listed
27. Service charges should be calculated correctly
28. Hatfield & McCoy Combo Special upsell strip will not be displayed again, instead following upsell opportunity strip will be displayed in below order below offer details
1. Combo Special will displayed in full image template tile 
2. Ma's Soup will be displayed in Dynamic tile template with a Thumbnail Image
29. User should be navigated to schedule list page
30. Hatfield & McCoy event should be added to cart and Source offers should not be discounted again
31. Total savings should not be changed
32. Cross section of delivery methods  and payment methods available for the events in the cart should be listed
33. Service charges should be calculated correctly
34. Transaction should be completed successfully and note the transaction id
35. source event ticket : Triggered by upsell sales group id=null, Discounted by upsell sales group id=<did>
target event ticket : Triggered by upsell sales group id=<tid>, Discounted by upsell sales group id=null
additional event ticket: Triggered by upsell sales group id=null, Discounted by upsell sales group id=null
36. Order details should be displayed correctly in PV

22. Upsell sales group id: 1001 and source offer id noted in step 5 should be passed in logs
23. Values should be updated correctly for upsell sales group id: 1002

title: Verify adding target event to cart when Discount Type is All Sources

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch MPV Schedule link
2. Select an event from Event Run: 2018CB (Comedy Barn)
3. Verify the nav map request and response
4. select few seats via section/seat map and click on add to cart - 2 seats
5. Login with valid credentials 
6. Verify the lock request and response
7. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed 
8. Verify the availability request and response for upsell event availability
9. Verify the PVO2 Availability and NavMap Availability caches updated
10. Verify the Price Group, Nav Map Availability, and Seat Map calls in DB
Example :-
Select * from PVO.perf_pg_availability where perf_id = 7132276
Select * from PVO.perf_nav_map where perf_id = 7132276
Select * from PVO.perf_seat_map where perf_id = 7132276;
11. Verify the Availability Semaphore updated

15. Verify the Upsell opportunities displayed 
16. Select Hatfield special upsell opputunity
17. Select a even run eg: Event Run: 2018HM (Hatfield & McCoy)
18. Select an event 
19. Select the available sections and verify the buyer type quantity page 
20. Click on add to cart
21. Verify PVODC and PV logs for lock seats
22. Select delivery method and payment method and complete the transaction
23. Verify Order details in PV
24. Verify PVODC and PV logs for checkout
25. Check value of Triggered by upsell sales group id and Discounted by upsell sales group id in DB

1. Calendar view will be displayed 
2. Availability page will be displayed 
3. The  upsell_sales_group_id  and relative target offers are passed in the response correctly
4. Forced login page will be displayed 
5. shopping cart page will be displayed 
6. The offer and buyer type details should be passed correctly in response - Upsell & Ref data, there will be a sourceOfferId and a salesGroupId
7. Hatfield upsell opportunity will be displayed with Full Image
8. Availability call passed as expected
9. PVO2 Availability and NavMap Availability caches updated to do a look up with perfId + operator + upsellSalesGroupId.
10. Values are updated as expected
11. semaphore set succesully before retrieving new availability data from PV - perf_id + operator + salesGroupID 
12. 
13. Hatfield upsell opportunity still be displayed once for entire cart with Full Image
14. 
15. Hatfield upsell opportunity still be displayed once for entire cart with Full Image
16. Only 1 sales group item will be displayed with Full Image: Event Run: 2018HM (Hatfield & McCoy)
17. Schedule page will be displayed based on the filter (From 7 calendar days to 3 hours before the trigger event, and from 3 hours until 7 calendar days after the trigger event. C)
18. Availability page will be displayed with available section
19. Source buyer type quantity will displayed with quantity as enforced to the quantity of main offer - quantity=2
20. Shopping cart page will be displayed with the added upsell offer and the main offer will be retained

24.

target event ticket : Triggered by upsell sales group id=<tid>, Discounted by upsell sales group id=null

title: Verify that the target events displayed in each upsell opportunity is based on the last event added in the cart.
custom_preconds: Valid user ad valid event should be available

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Launch schedule link and choose source event
2. Select tickets from availability page and navigate to login page
3. Login with a valid credentials
4. Now lock seats from target event and reach cart page
5. now select the upsell item of source event(offer 1)
6. verify MPV uses the same upsell sales group id in the URL for both offers 
7. Verify that the target events displayed in each upsell opportunity is based on the last event added in the cart.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. User should be able to launch the event
Event availability page should be displayed
2. User should be able to select tickets and should be able to navigated to login page 
3. User should be able to login with valid credentials 
User should be navigated to shopping cart page
4.  cart has 2 offers
5. it contain few target events. same above target event will be displayed
6. MPV uses the same upsell sales group id in the URL for both offers 
7. Target events displayed in each upsell opportunity is based on the last event added in the cart.

title: Verify the user can add & complete the transaction where the cart contains Main offer after adding upsell offer for the first added enterprise upsell

Have Fee Hedrick Setup of EnterPrise upsells

3. Select Sep 7^th^ friday event
4. Seats added to the cart
5. Verify Upsell opportunity is displayed in the cart page
6. Select the sales group item- Verify Saturday and Sunday events are available
7. Add Sep 8^th event as target
8. Add an upsell item from the Sep 8^th^ event Upsell Opportunity 
9. Verify the user is able to remove the main offer which results removal of entire cart
10. Repeat Steps 3-8
11. Complete transaction on locking the seats
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. The MPV Single sales URL for the Main event should be launched
2. The September event should be filtered in Calendar view.
3. The Friday event should be chosen
4. The Seats should be added to the cart
5. Sales group based Upsell Opportunity should be displayed in the cart
6. Saturday and Sunday events should be  available in calendar
7. The target event should be selected 
8. The target event should be selected for the added upsell opprortunity - ie, 3 events are available in the sales group item (Sep 7th, Sep 8th and Sep 9th)

9. The entire cart should be removed
10. 
11. The Transaction should be completed succesfully

title: Verify whether the source offer is removed when target offer is added to cart

2. Lock Source offer and select the upsell target offer 
3. Navigate to cart

5. Verify the same via V2 API and PVODC V1 API

2. The offer should be selected 
3. The user is navigated to cart

4. The offer should be removed

title: Verify the end to end flow when a event trigger a package as upsell
